description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              RESPONSIBITLITIES
              

              - Preparing and liaisons with another teacher in Science and Technology Faculty to delivering lessons on computer science and robotics to primary, middle and high school students.
              
              - Provide feedback to students
              
              - Ensure that all students receive a 21st century STEM-based education that is academically rigorous, constructivist, personalized, relevant and engaging
              
              - Maintain records of students progression and development
              
              - Ensure the curriculum is up-to-date
              
              - Support and guide team members through professional exchange
              
              - Established positive relationships with parents, students and colleagues
              
              - Undertake business development projects
              
              - Develop and teach a hands-on, skills based Robotics (STEM) course
              
              - Prepare students to demonstrate their learning in a real-world setting (performance, competition, etc.)
              
              - Provides support to teachers to access online resources
              
              - Manage School Makerspace. Coordinate all aspects of Maker Space programming for students, teachers and families including curriculum development, program implementation and basic day-to-day operations of the space.
              
              - Provides assistance to teachers and staff members in planning and incorporating STEM activities into daily instruction.
              
              - Liaisons with organizations to promote environmental initiatives.
              
              - Provides STEM-related professional development to colleagues.
              
              - Lead academic STEM clubs (Coding, Engineering, Robotics, etc...) after school to ensure that our students have multiple opportunities to develop mastery
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE
              
              - Bachelor or above in Computer Science/Robotics or relevant subjects
              
              - Demonstrated ability and expertise in Robotics (STEM) education
              
              - Demonstrate significant coding experience
              
              - Familiar with or willing to learn Javacript, Python, Lego Mindstorms, Arduino and/or Raspberry Pi (robotics)
              
              - English native speaker
              
              - Capable to work collaboratively as a member of a team
              
              - Ability to inspire students and create a stimulating learning environment
              
              - Energetic and passionate about being a role model for all youth
              
              - Strong communication and teamwork skills
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
